items.title: Robertson: Szoboszlai backheel 'unacceptable'
items.summary: Liverpool defender Andy Robertson has described teammate Dominik Szoboszlai's careless backheel against Barnsley as "unacceptable."

items.title: Man United name Carrick boss until end of season
items.summary: Manchester United have appointed former player Michael Carrick as their head coach until the end of the season, the club confirmed Tuesday.

items.title: Semenyo nets again as Man City close in on final
items.summary: Antoine Semenyo scored his second goal in as many games for his new club as Manchester City secured a precious Carabao Cup semifinal advantage over holders Newcastle.

items.title: Klopp: Xabi's Madrid exit 'nothing to do with me'
items.summary: J√ºrgen Klopp has stated that he has not received any calls from Real Madrid following the exit of Xabi Alonso, and affirmed that the decision has nothing to do with him.

items.title: Newcastle United v Manchester City: Carabao Cup semi-final first leg ‚Äì live
items.summary: Antoine Semenyo and Rayan Cherki got the goals as the visitors took control of a tie in which the officials took almost six minutes to rule out a goal An email: ‚ÄúG‚ÄôDay Bazza,‚Äù writes Chris Paraskevas from Australia. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a civilized 0700 kickoff for those of us Down Under and there is only one question on Newcastle fans‚Äô collective hive mind: will Anthony Gordon and Anthony Elanga wear matching headbands tonight? ‚ÄúAs the season has progressed, Gordon has moved from plain black headband to a branded Adidas one, but Elanga‚Äôs game and fashion have comparatively stalled this season - maybe he‚Äôll go fot something spicey, like one of the bandanas the gangsters wear in Blood In Blood Out. items.title: Gyrano Kerk in topvorm: dubbelslag brengt Oosting en Antwerp naar halve finale
items.summary: Gyrano Kerk is in absolute topvorm in Belgi√´. De voormalig aanvaller van FC Utrecht schoot Antwerp FC dinsdag diep in de verlenging naar de halve finale van de Beker van Belgi√´. Kerk had in de eerste helft ook al de openingstreffer voor zijn rekening genomen.

items.title: Chagrijn in Galgenwaard: Twente ten koste van Utrecht naar kwartfinale KNVB Beker
items.summary: FC Twente heeft zich dinsdagavond als eerste ploeg geplaatst voor de kwartfinale van de Eurojackpot KNVB Beker. FC Utrecht leidde halverwege nog in de eigen Galgenwaard, maar was duidelijk de mindere van de twee ploegen en begon het nieuwe jaar met een flinke domper.

items.title: VI Live: Rensch met Roma uitgeschakeld, Marseille haalt uit tegen amateurs
items.summary: De VI Live van dinsdag 13 januari staat volledig in het teken van bekervoetbal in zowel het binnen- als buitenland √©n de Bundesliga. In de Eurojackpot KNVB Beker nemen FC Utrecht en FC Twente het tegen elkaar op. In de League Cup spelen Newcastle United en Manchester City tegen elkaar. Verder komen ook Borussia Dortmund, Atl√©tico Madrid en AS Roma in actie.

items.title: City zet mede dankzij nieuweling Semenyo grote stap richting Wembley
items.summary: Antoine Semenyo beleeft een droomweek bij zijn nieuwe club Manchester City. De Ghanees scoorde afgelopen zaterdag direct bij zijn debuut, drie dagen later opende hij de score in de League Cup tegen Newcastle United.

items.title: Atl√©tico bekert door dankzij prachtige vrije trap Griezmann
items.summary: Atl√©tico Madrid staat in de kwartfinales van de Copa del Rey. De ploeg van Diego Simeone won op bezoek bij Deportivo La Coru√±a dankzij een wonderschone treffer van Antoine Griezmann.

items.title: Man City prepare Guehi offer - Wednesday's gossip
items.summary: Manchester City prepare offer for Marc Guehi, Bayern Munich chief tries to convince the Crystal Palace defender, and Rashford return to Manchester United is off the cards.

items.title: DeChambeau, Rahm and Smith all committed to LIV Golf for upcoming season
items.summary: Bryson DeChambeau, Jon Rahm and Cam Smith have committed to LIV Golf after Brooks Koepka announced his LIV Golf departure after four seasons with the Saudi-backed circuit.

items.title: Real Madrid fired Xabi Alonso after 233 days. Where did it all go wrong?
items.summary: Xabi Alonso returned to Real Madrid as a club legend and one of the most sought-after coaches around, but he lasted less than a year. What happened?

items.title: Man Utd choose Carrick as the right man for the job - for now
items.summary: Manchester United have gone with Michael Carrick as head coach until the end of the season, as Rob Dorsett and Danyal Khan break down why the club's hierarchy and Jason Wilcox landed on the appointment...

items.title: Michael Carrick confirmed by Manchester United as interim manager until end of season
items.summary: Steve Holland and Jonathan Woodgate also on staff ‚ÄòI know what it takes to succeed here,‚Äô insists Carrick Michael Carrick has called on everyone at Manchester United to ‚Äúpull together‚Äù in order to bring ¬≠success back to the club, after being appointed on Tuesday night as head coach until the end of the season. The former midfielder has brought the ex-England assistant Steve ¬≠Holland and Jonathan Woodgate to work alongside him. They will join Jonny Evans, Travis Binnion and Craig Mawson in the backroom staff. It is Carrick‚Äôs second spell leading the team, having taken charge previously of three games after Ole Gunnar ¬≠Solskj√¶r was dismissed in 2021. Continue reading...

items.title: Salah-Mane rivalry renewed in Afcon semi-finals
items.summary: Mohamed Salah's Egypt will face Senegal in the Afcon 2025 semi-finals, offering the chance of revenge against his old Liverpool team-mate Sadio Mane.

items.title: Tomlin steps down as coach of Steelers after 19 seasons
items.summary: Mike Tomlin - the longest-tenured head coach in major American professional sports - has stepped down from his job as coach of the Pittsburgh Steelers after yet another quick playoff exit.

items.title: Carrick confirmed as Man Utd caretaker head coach
items.summary: Manchester United appoint former player Michael Carrick as caretaker head coach until the end of the season.

items.title: Carrick named Man Utd head coach until end of season
items.summary: Manchester United have appointed Michael Carrick as head coach until the end of the season.

items.title: What does Trump's foreign policy mean for World Cup?
items.summary: As a group of cross-party MPs calls on Fifa to consider expelling the USA from the World Cup, BBC Sport analyses what Donald Trump‚Äôs foreign policy means for the tournament.
